slides.title: Tkinter Application-Building Assist
slides.desc: Software built to lead the way for inexperienced coders who are looking to build their own applications.

slides.title: Dijkstra's Path Finder
slides.desc: Optimizes and finds the shortest path of directions from one point to another on large-scale maps, using Dijkstra's algorithm.

slides.title: Relational Database Model
slides.desc: Simulation of a large-scale relational database and relational algebra operations for user queries.

slides.title: Logistic Regression Trainer
slides.desc: Trains and evaluates data sets using a custom logistic regression algorithm, while analyzing and graphing overfitting patterns.
